name: Black Friday Smackdown
description:
Black Friday is one of the most chaotic days a department store can have. Race against the clock to collect all the items you want, and punch anyone who gets in your way!

This is a student project made using the Unreal 4 Engine

Credits:

Patrick Suess - Programmer/Ai Programmer/Level Designer

Selena Bui - Concept Artist/Texture Artist/UI Designer

Andrew Grant - Programmer/3D Artist/Texture Artist

Kenna Thacker - 3D Artist/UI Designer

This video game Black Friday Smackdown uses these sounds from Freesound.org:

Punch, slap, n' kick.wav by CGEffex (https://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/98341/)
